name: specswarm
description: Complete software development toolkit: spec-driven workflows, autonomous orchestration, lifecycle management (bugfix/modify/refactor), quality validation, and performance monitoring. v3.3.9: MANDATORY/ALWAYS directive descriptions + unique value emphasis + conflict removal. v3.3.8: Directory name matching. v3.3.7: File permissions + auto-discovery. v3.3.6: Action-focused triggers.
